awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Presidential Young Investigator Award
awd_abstract_narration: This reserch program includes three related projects:                                                                                                           1.  Calculation and visualization of large eddy structures                      arising in two and three dimensional viscous flow.                                                                                                              2.  Development of numerical algorithms for following propagating               interface in flames and crystals.                                                                                                                               3.  Analysis of the effect of wavelength truncation on numerical                models for energy cascades.                                                                                                                                     The results from this research program will have a significant                  impact on current research on combustion and related fluid                      dynamics problems.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
